title: Amazon Essentials Men's Regular-Fit Long-Sleeve Casual Poplin Shirt
description: REGULAR FIT: Comfortable, easy fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist.
WASHED POPLIN: Made from lightweight yet durable washed poplin, offering comfort and versatility for any season.

EVERYDAY SHIRTING: With classic shirting details, the long sleeve poplin shirt is the perfect year-round wardrobe staple. Wear it tucked in for a polished look or untucked for casual sophistication. Pairs effortlessly with jeans, chinos, or shorts.
DETAILS: Features a sturdy spread collar construction, a center front placket with secure button closure, and a classic shirt tail hem.
